cost: The cost of a mod is not something that can be determined without discussing the specifics of the mod.  Please contact me for a quote.
time: The time it takes to complete a mod is not something that can be determined without discussing the specifics of the mod.  Please contact me for a quote.
versions: I support the latest major versions of the game and its minor versions (i.e. if 1.20 is the newest major update, I support all of 1.20.x)
updates: Yes, I offer version updates for mods at a fee that depends on how different the versions are.  Please contact me for a quote.
